title: 谁能告诉我  联机怎么取消怪物？
author: qq459514217zz

replies.author: 55IW
replies.txt_content: 可以在设置文件夹里改..

replies.author: unlevel
replies.txt_content: 你可以打开服务器文件夹 找到server.properties 用写字板打开 将spawn-monsters=true改为false 就行了

replies.author: w873130585
replies.txt_content: 服务器不生怪= =那是什么服

replies.author: 召唤OF使命
replies.txt_content: 我倒是想让服务器里怪物如云
